item.title: Accessibility Checklist
item.description: Ben Cano has created an accessibility checklist with priority categorized accesibility checkpoints or criteria that map to 14 accessibility principles. Going through the prioritized checklist, the designer/developer takes a gradual approach from minimal acecessibility towards optimal or most accessible. (This entry posted on behalf of Ben Cano)
